definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺噴灑化學物質的身體。

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種油品可開發用作防治蚊蟲的新型殺幼蟲藥劑。

sentences.english: Screens, light and flexible, can be installed to prevent invasion of the mosquitoes and insects.
sentences.chinese: 可配置紗網，輕巧靈活，有效防止蚊蟲入侵。

sentences.english: Mother likes to burn a stick of incense to drive away mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏點上一支線香驅除蚊蟲。

sentences.english: Methods To collect the mosquitoes by light-trap each weeks for one year.
sentences.chinese: 方法應用誘蚊燈每週定時收集地庫中的蚊蟲樣本。

sentences.english: Studies showed that these two species of mosquitoes were susceptible to CHIK virus.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，這兩種蚊蟲對基孔肯雅病毒易感。

sentences.english: The mosquito knows full well, small as he is he's a beast of prey.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲知道得很清楚，他雖然小卻是一個食肉獸。

sentences.english: The red spot on his arm is a sting of a mosquito .
sentences.chinese: 他胳膊上的小紅點是蚊蟲叮咬留下的傷痕。

sentences.english: Dengue is spread through the bite of infected mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱是經由帶病毒的蚊蟲叮咬進行傳播的。

sentences.english: We were starving and bombarded by mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲猖獗，什麼驅蚊藥都不管用。

sentences.english: I also like that it has the citronella to protect from bug bites.
sentences.chinese: 我也非常喜歡它含有香茅成分來防止蚊蟲叮咬。

sentences.english: Objective To observe on collecting mosquitoes in human rooms by animal-shelter on July, 2001.
sentences.chinese: 目的採取動物屏障對傣族人房進行蚊蟲捕捉效果觀察。

sentences.english: When mosquitoes fly, their wing would produce continuous wingbeat sounds.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲飛翔時，翅上下拍打會形成連續的翅振音。

sentences.english: We have TIGER Balm for mosquito bites.
sentences.chinese: 我們這裏有治療蚊蟲叮咬的虎牌清涼油。

sentences.english: Malaria caused by mosquito bites which spread parasites to human beings.
sentences.chinese: 瘧疾是通過蚊蟲叮咬向人體傳播寄生蟲而感染的。

sentences.english: The little yard overgrown with weeds provided a comfortable haven for mosquitoes and small insects of all descriptions.
sentences.chinese: 小院子裏長滿了草，是蚊蟲同各種小蟲的安適的國土。

definition: to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
to drive (vehicle)/to drive out/to chase away/to herd (people towards a gate)
hotbed/breeding ground/fig. breeding ground for crimes or sedition
